scripts.psi_build: echo [psi_build] Beginning installation. && npm run lint && npm install && npm run clean && npm run vanillaBuild && zowe plugins install . && npm run psi_deactivateEjes_from_libEjes && npm run psi_activateEjes_from_libEjes && echo [psi_build] Test Zowe plugin... && zowe ejes query st -V  && echo [psi_build] Build complete.
scripts.psi_activateEjes_from_libEjes: echo [psi_activateEjes_from_libEjes] Activating EJES in the project libEjes directory... && cd libEjes && echo [psi_activateEjes_from_libEjes] libEjes Directory: && cd && npm link . && cd .. && cd && echo [psi_activateEjes_from_libEjes] Test pure node ejes... && ejes batch sh -V && echo [psi_activateEjes_from_libEjes] EJES activated from the project libEjes directory.
scripts.psi_deactivateEjes_from_libEjes: echo [psi_deactivateEjes_from_libEjes] Deactivating EJES in project libEjes directory && cd libEjes && echo [psi_deactivateEjes_from_libEjes] libEjes Directory: && cd && npm unlink . && cd .. && echo [dectivateEjesDev] ejesRM Directory: && cd && echo [dectivateEjesDev] EJES deactivated in the project libEjes.
scripts.build: echo [build] Beginning installation. && npm install && npm run clean && npm run vanillaBuild && npm run lint && zowe plugins install . && echo [build] Test Zowe plugin... && zowe ejes query st -V  && echo [build] Build and activation complete.
scripts.activateEjes: echo [activateEjes] Activating EJES from the node_modules directory... && cd node_modules/phoenixsoftware/ejes-restapi-node-clis && echo [activateEjes] libEjes Directory: && cd  && npm link . && cd ../../.. && cd && echo [activateEjes] Test pure node ejes... && ejes batch sh -V && echo [activateEjes] EJES activated in the mode_modules directory.
scripts.deactivateEjes: echo [deactivateEjes] Deactivating Ejes in the node_modules directory && cd node_modules/phoenixsoftware/ejes-restapi-node-clis && echo [deactivateEjes] libEjes Directory: && cd && npm unlink . && cd ../../.. && echo [deactivateEjes] ejesRM Directory: && cd && echo [deactivateEjes] EJES deactivated in the node_modules directory.
scripts.RefreshEjes: echo [installEjes] Installing npm modules... && cd libEjes && npm uninstall . && npm install . && cd .. && echo [installEjes] Done.
scripts.installPlugin: echo [installPlugin] Installing Zowe Plugin... && zowe plugins install . && echo [installPlugin] Testing plugin installation... && Zowe ejes
scripts.installPluginOld: npm install && npm run clean && npm run vanillaBuild && zowe plugins install . && npm run activateEjes
scripts.uninstallPlugin: echo [uninstallPlugin] Uninstalling Zowe Plugin... && zowe plugins uninstall @phoenixsoftware/ejes-cli && echo [uninstallPlugin] Uninstall complete.
